string.text: Safehouse: Reach Skadovsk wreck
Only major camps are (relatively) safe in the Zone. Reach the nearest one at the Skadovsk wreck.
Maps: Find data for the Pilot
Maps: Trade them to the Pilot
Maps of the areas between the Creek and Jupiter Factory might be useful for Pilot, the local guide.
Stingray-2: Investigate crash site
Investigate the Stingray-2 helicopter crash site
Stingray-5: Investigate crash site
Stingray-5: Identify what fried the electronics
Stingray: Find the source of damage done to the two helicopters
Stingray-5: Investigate crash site
I need to figure out what was the source of the massive electric shock that hit Stingray-5.
I need to identify what fried the on-board electronics of Stingray-4 and Stingray-5. So far, I know that they were hit by some sort of powerful electrical discharge.
Supplies: Get food for the mercenaries
A mercenary outfit camped out in the substation workshop asked me to bring them supplies - six conserves, bread loaves or sausages.
Supplies: Collected enough food for the mercenaries
I should take the supplies I collected to the mercenaries at the workshop.
Tools: Inspect workshop
Rumor has it, that precision tools are still in the waystation. A talented mechanic could sure use them.
Chimera hunt: Track down the mutant while it rests.
I need to find the Chimera before it wakes up.
Finding Magpies: Gaunt's story
It seems that Soroka, a stalker who screwed up a job for Gaunt, joined the Freedom faction and now calls himself Flint.
Chimera Hunt: Kill the mutant
The Chimera woke up, I need to kill it while I still can.
Chimera Hunt: Meet with Gaunt in the bar at three o'clock in the morning
I need to meet with Gaunt before dawn to go with his team and hunt that chimera.
Hunting chimera: Report to Hypericum
I should tell a stalker named Hypericum about our succesful hunt for the chimera.
Finding Magpies: Find the stalker
A stalker named Magpie screwed over Gaunt's group when the chimera attack. They asked to find the bastard.
Evacuation Zones: Check zone "B205"
I found a map marked with evacuation zones marked on it in one of the helicopters. I should check if any soldiers appeared at "B205".
Evacuation Zones: Check zone "B28"
I found a map marked with evacuation zones marked on it in one of the helicopters. I should check if any soldiers appeared at "B28".
Evacuation Zones: Find out the coordinates of zone "B28"
I found a recording in the black box of one of the Stingray helicopters. The squadron leader spoke about the "B28" evacuation zone, I should determine its coordinates.
Evacuation Zones: Get to zone "B28"
point of collection, where they had to meet the military is in Pripyat. We must find a way to get there.
Evacuation Zones: Check zone "B2"
I found a map with evacuation zones marked on it in one of the helicopters. I should check if any soldiers appeared at "B2".
Extraordinary Phenomena: Bring Beard the artifact
The source of the strange glow was an even stranger artifact. Clearly, this is what Beard has sent me for.
Extraordinary Phenomena: Ask stalkers about the artifact
Perhaps stalkers will know something about the strange artifact, or point me to someone who knows. I should talk to them.
Extraordinary Phenomena: Identify the source of the glow on the dredging barge
Beard asked me to identify the source of the peculiar glow on board the dredging barge to the east.
Extraordinary Phenomena: Take the artifact
A strange artifact is the source of the strange glow. I should take it.
Extraordinary Phenomena: Tell Beard about the artifact
The source of the strange glow was an even stranger artifact. Even without the artifact, Beard deserves to be told about it.
Road To Plateau: Jump into the anomaly
It seems the only way to the plateau is through the anomaly. I need to jump into it.
Road To Plateau: Finding the way
My PDA reported strange movements on the plateau, I should identify the source.
Road To Plateau: To know the way
They say that a stalker named Noah knows the way to the plateau. I should consult him.
Missing Stalkers: Bring proof of Tremors involvement
I have Tremor's PDA. Its records make it clear that he was responsible for stalker disappearances. I should show it to Beard back on the Skadovsk.
Missing Stalkers: Find evidence of Tremors involvement
I don't have any evidence that Tremor's responsible for stalker disappearances. I should find it and report.
Stingray-3: Investigate crash site
Investigate the crash site of Stingray-3.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but my time is limited - others are also seeking to complete his order.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but my time is limited - I need to remember that others are also seeking to complete his order.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but I'm running out of time - another group found the artifact. I should be able to trace their signal and stay ahead of them.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but another group completed the order. I'll only get half the price of the artifact.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact,.
Artifact Order: Bring the Gravi to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the Eye to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the Bubble to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the "Miming to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the Goldfish to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the Flame to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the Firefly to Beard
Artifact Order: Bring the Snowflake to Beard
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but my time is limited - others are also seeking to complete his order.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but my time is limited - I need to remember that others are also seeking to complete his order.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but I'm running out of time - another group found the artifact. I should be able to trace their signal and stay ahead of them.
Beard asked me to bring him an artifact, but another group completed the order. I'll only get half the price of the artifact.
Beard asked me to find an artifact for him.
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Gravi
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Eye
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Bubble
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Miming
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Golden Fish
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Flame
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Firefly
Artifact Order: Find an artifact called Snowflake
The Compass: Locate Noah and find out where you can get this rare artifact
I can find Noah on an old barge (called Ark), he should know where to find the rare Compass artifact. Beard's client, MOSOP, is ready to pay real well for it.
The Compass: Bring the artifact to Beard
The Compass: Find out where you can get the artifact
Sultan wants to grab the Compass artifact, snatch it right from under Beard's nose. I should find Noah's barge and learn where to find the artifact.
The Compass: Bring Sultan the artifact
The artifact that Noah gave me is the Compass. I should get it to Sultan straight away.
Shady Business: Get cut from Beard
worth taking from the Beards interest due to his income.
Prospective Business: Talk to Sultan
Owl believes that Beard did not fullfill his end of the bargain, and decided to appeal for help to the local authority - Sultan.
Shady Business: Appropriate stalker detectors
I need to get the prototype detectors back from the stalkers, by any means necessary. When Beard loses his source of artifacts, he'd have to agree to Sultan's terms.
Shady Business: Talk to Sultan
Beard had no detectors, so he has to come to the Sultan and listen to him.
Shady Business: Coerce Beard into working for Sultan
Now, Beard will not be able to conduct business independently, as he has neither buyers nor detectors - he'll have to work for Sultan.
Shady Business: Learn about Beard's current enterprise
I need to know what's Beard's current project. This will help us cut his supply lines.
Shady Business: Retrieve detectors from the stalkers
I need to get Beard's prototype detectors from his stalkers. When he loses them, he'll have to bend to Sultan's terms.
Prospective Business: bring Novikov three detectors Veles »
Owl invited me to participate in a lucrative business deal. To do this, I need to find three Veles detectors and give them to Novikov at the scientist bunker.
Prospective Business: to await the detectors Owl
Novikov took the detectors and said that he will forward them to Owl. I should wait until he's finished with the detectors, and then ask Owl about the results.
Prospective Business: Talk to Owl
Owl, the trader, contacted me by radio that he has problems and asked me to come to him.
Prospective Business: Convince Beard to honour the agreement
Dealer Owl believes that Beard did not fulfill his end of the bargain. I need to talk to him and force him to honour to the agreement.
Prospective Business: Getting a fair share from Owl
Beard does not believe Owl's claims - I need to find out who was right, and get my share.

A stalker named Snag asked me to bring him his box with his belongings. He hid it in an old Zaporozhets, but after the earthquake it fell down into a fault. Snag is afraid of going down there, since there are a lot of Snorks there.
container snags received, must now be attributed to its owner, and divided to be honest its contents.
Bloodsucker Nest: Tell stalkers
must inform stalkers on the Bloodsucker Nest detected by BIS Circle ».
Bloodsucker Nest: Inform Beard
I need to tell Beard of the bloodsucker nest we found underneath the Circle station, so that he can decide on how to secure it.
Missing Stalkers: Follow Glouchar
Glouchar requests to inspect, along with an abandoned building high schools. He noticed bloodsuckers and wants to check whether there hunter.
Missing Stalkers: to understand what happened
seems, tremor, and not as a harmless, it is necessary to understand what happened here.
Missing Stalkers: Find Glouchar
Glouchar went to the port cranes for some reason. I might learn something about the missing stalkers there, I guess.
Missing Stalkers: Find Glouchar
Glouchar's not at his usual place. I should ask Beard, maybe he knows where did he go.
Missing Stalkers: Find the missing hunter

Glouchar asked me to help him in his search for the missing hunter, who wanted to find the lair of the bloodsuckers. Based on available information, it seems that bloodsuckers are responsible for all the recent disappearances of stalkers.
Missing Stalkers: Get out of the bloodsucker nest
We found a bloodsucker nest in the basement... they seem to be in some strange state of torpor. We need to get out without making any noise.
Missing Stalkers: Meet Glouchar
It's probably worth seeing Glouchar again and discuss what to do about finding the lost hunter.
Missing Stalkers: Meet Glouchar later
The BIS building had no clues as to the whereabouts of Daniel, however, we found something disturbing inside... he asked me to meet him later, after he gets some intel on the matter.
Missing Stalkers: Meet Glouchar
There was only a dead bloodsucker in the forest location Glouchar gave me, but it seems he found something obviously interesting and requests that I join him.
As it turned out, stalker disappearances weren't caused by bloodsuckers, but Tremor, Skadovsk's own medic.
Tools: Bring tools for Cardan
Cardan asked me to find two sets of tools: one for fine work, one for rough work. He'll pay for each set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively.
Tools: Bring tools to Cardan
Cardan asked me to find two sets of tools: one for rough work, one for calibration. He'll pay for each set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively.
Tools: Bring tools to Cardan
Cardan asked me to find a set of tools for rough work. He'll pay for each set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively
Tools: Bring tools to Cardan
Cardan asked me to find two sets of tools: one for fine work, one for calibration. He'll pay for each set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively.
Tools: Bring tools to Cardan
Cardan asked me to find a set of tools for fine work. He'll pay for the set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively.
Tools: Bring tools to Cardan
Cardan asked me to find a set of tools for calibration. He'll pay for the set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively.
Tools: Bring tools to Cardan
Cardan asked me to find three sets of tools: for rough work, for fine work, and for calibration. He'll pay for each set, and upgrade my weapons or body armor more extensively.
Mercenary Camp: Bring any available information
Owl promised to pay me well for any information I could find the the mercenary camp at the waste processing plant. He's interested in their plans.
Mercenary Camp: Locate intel
Owl promised to pay me well for any information I could find the the mercenary camp at the waste processing plant. He's interested in their plans.
Three Comrades: Learn about Barge's fate
Cardan asked me to apologize to his companion, a stalker named barge. They quarreled, and Barge went off in an unknown direction.
Three Comrades: Learn what happened to Barge and Joker
Cardan asked me to apologize to his comrades, stalkers Barge and Joker. They quarreled and his comrades left in unknown directions.
Three Comrades: Learn about Joker's fate
Cardan asked me to apologize to his companion, a stalker named Joker. They quarreled, and Joker has left in an unknown direction.
A Specific Order: Get the goods
My order's completed, I can get it from Nimble.
A Specific Order: Expected delivery
I placed my order, Nimble should finalize it soon.
Reputation: Find Snag
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. Nimble never traded stolen property, Snag was lyuing, as usual. He was last seen at the port cranes, he might still be there.
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. He wasn't at the cranes, but the bandits might know where he is.
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. It seems that bandits are involved in this case and know where to find him.
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. I've got no clue as to where to look for him.
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. Judging by the PDA I found on one of the bandits snag people looking for Sultan. But where to find him - is unknown.
Reputation: Learn where missing SnagIt
Snag's not at his usual place, I should ask the locals, maybe someone knows where did he go.
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. He's not at his usual place, maybe Sultan knows where to find Snag.
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. He's not at his usual place, maybe Beard knows where to find Snag.
Reputation: Talk to Snag
I must find Snag, and make him bite his tongue. Nimble never sold stolen goods, Snag lied. As usual.
Bloodsucker Nest: Find a ventilation shaft
Find a ventilation shaft through which to dump poison gas into the lair of bloodsuckers.
Bloodsucker Nest: to find a poison gas
To destroy the lair I need poison gas. Owl must know where I can find it.
to destroy the lair of the need poison gas. Owl said that gas tanks should still be in the abandoned military convoy.
Bloodsucker Nest: to find the keys for the container
The documents mention where are the keys to the gas tank container. Ineed to find them.
Bloodsucker Nest: Find a way to open the container with the gas tank
The container with the gas tank is closed. I have to find a way to open it.
Bloodsucker Nest: Install the gas tank
Install the gas tank in the ventilation system of the BIS bunker. It must enter the shafts and fill the basement, in order to destroy the bloodsuckers.
Bloodsucker Nest: Inform Beard about the lair's destruction
It should inform the beard on the destruction of dens bloodsuckers. Now stalkers on "Skadovsk" are more secure.
Bloodsucker Nest: Turn the valve
Turn the valve to release the poisonous gas into the station's basement and desroy the bloodsucker nest.
Bloodsucker Nest: Wait for the gas to act
I need to make sure that the gas got into the lair, and that all bloodsuckers are dead.
Deal: Meet with bandits near the Forestry
Sultan asked to participate in a transaction with one guy. It is necessary to accompany his people and cover them.
Deal: Meet with the trader
Owl offered me a job - to protect a merchant during a transaction. Obviously, the deal is questionable and I may get in trouble.
Deal: Meet with stalkers near the Forestry
I should meet the stalkers near the Forest Authority, and help them stop the transaction between the bandits and the arms dealer.
Deal: Protect the trader
The trader explained to me my role during the transaction.
Deal: Overhear the conversation
Stalkers want to overhear the conversation between the bandits and the arms dealer.
Deal: Crash the deal
I should stop the deal between the bandits and the arms dealer by any means necessary.
Deal: Remove the witnesses
The deal with the dealer was interrupted, you must kill all witnesses.
Deal: Protect the trader
It's necessary to protect the merchant. He ordered me to remove all the witnesses of the transaction, including his customers.
Deal: Search the merchant
The merchant might have some important information on his body, it might come in handy.
Deal: Cover the bandits during the transaction
While the bandits negotiate with the arms dealer, I must be alert and cover them in case of an emergency.
Deal: Talk to the trader
I fulfilled my obligations, it's time to get my paycheck.
Deal: Receive your reward from Beard
Beard promised a reward, if we prevent the transaction between the bandits and the dealer. Now, the deal is definitely not going to take place, so I'm in for a reward.
Deal: Talk with the principal of the bandits
I must inform the chief of the bandits about my willingness to participate in the transaction.
Backstab: Decide what to do
Backstab: Attack the stalkers
Backstab: Get the reward
The attack on the camp was repulsed, I can talk with the stalkers and receive my reward. They'd have perished if I didn't warn them.
A group of stalkers decided to become a gang and rob their own brethren, stalkers. I must decide what to do: either take part in the raid, warn the stalkers, or do not intervene.
Backstab: Wait until it's time
Backstab: Waiting for the right moment
Unreachable Zaporozhetz: Bring Snag his container back
Deal: Talk with the leader of stalker squad
We broke up the deal and the arms dealer is dead. I should talk with the leader of stalker squad
Missing Stalkers: Inform the Skadovsk about what happened
I need to find the keys, open the gas container and remove the poison gas.
Bloodsucker Nest: Get poison gas from the wrecked convoy
Backstab: Turning on the raiders
I should attack the raiders from behind, to aid the stalkers in repelling the attack.
Backstab: Meet with the raiders
I should participate in the raider attack on the stalker camp.
Backstab: Join the raider strike team
The stalkers asked me to help them repel the attack. I should join their ranks, in order to attack them from behind.
Raiders will wait near Shevchenko, I have to meet them to participate in the attack on the stalker camp.
Wait for the raiders - they want to attack the stalker camp at night, in total darkness. The meeting place: Shevchenko wreck.
Backstab: Talk to the raiders
Attack on the stalker camp was successful. Now, it's time to talk with my accomplices.
I have to wait until the robbers are distracted by the fighting. Then I can backstab them to help stalkers from the Shevchenko.
Shady Business: Work for Beard
In order to get prototype detectors, I need to work for Beard. This will allow for some real competition to arise.
I have to recover the cache and take it back to its owner.
Stingray-2's guidance computer still had maps of the terrain between the Creek and Jupiter factory loaded... might be useful to someone who can make out what they say.
Road To Plateau: Ask stalkers
It seems that the plateau is inaccessible through normal means... maybe local stalkers will know of other access points.
I got the artifact from Noah and I have the artifact Beard wants.
